mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_GOPAY_REV_MSG (TRADE_NO, CLIENT_TYPE, TOTAL_FEE, FEE_AMT, NOTIFY_URL, RETURN_URL, PAY_TIME) VALUES (#{orderCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalFee, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeAmt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notifyUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, TRADE_NO, CLIENT_TYPE, TOTAL_FEE, FEE_AMT, NOTIFY_URL, RETURN_URL, PAY_TIME FROM TBL_GOPAY_REV_MSG WHERE TRADE_NO = #{orderCode} ORDER BY PAY_TIME ASC
